basic.description:
In this course students will study Don Quijote II and a selection of novellas from Cervantes' Exemplary Novels.  The course will consider the socio-ecomonic and historical context and the literary implications of the continuation of Don Quijote I to provide a better understanding of 17th century Spain and the significance Cervantes' works hold today.
NOTE    Readings are in translation.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: Cervantes II: Later Works

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     LvL 3 or permission of the Dept. of LLCU
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from LLCU 331 ; SPAN331
